org.thesemproject.engine.parser

Class SemEmbeddedDocumentsExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tika.extractor.ParsingEmbeddedDocumentExtractor
      • org.thesemproject.engine.parser.SemEmbeddedDocumentsExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.tika.extractor.EmbeddedDocumentExtractor

    public class SemEmbeddedDocumentsExtractor
extends org.apache.tika.extractor.ParsingEmbeddedDocumentExtractor
    Estrattore di contenuti binari da un documento. Viene usato dal DocumentParser
